name: Classic Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce, shaved parmesan, crunchy croutons, and Caesar dressing.

name: Mediterranean Greek Salad
description: Tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, feta cheese, red onions & oregano vinaigrette.

name: Veggie Spring Roll
description: Rice paper rolls stuffed with fresh veggies, served with sweet chili dip.

name: Spicy Chicken Kathi Roll
description: Tandoori‑spiced chicken wrapped in a warm paratha with onions & chutney.

name: Decadent Chocolate Brownie
description: Rich, fudgy brownie topped with a drizzle of dark chocolate ganache.

name: Seasonal Fruit Tart
description: Buttery crust filled with vanilla custard and topped with fresh fruits.

name: Classic Club Sandwich
description: Turkey, bacon, lettuce, tomato & mayo stacked between toasted bread.

name: Grilled Veggie Panini
description: Zucchini, bell peppers, mushrooms & mozzarella on ciabatta, pressed crisp.

name: Chocolate Truffle Cake
description: Layered chocolate sponge with creamy dark chocolate truffle filling.

name: Red Velvet Celebration Cake
description: Moist red velvet layers with smooth cream cheese frosting.

name: Paneer Butter Masala
description: Cottage cheese cubes in a rich, buttery tomato gravy, served with rice.

name: Mixed Vegetable Curry
description: Seasonal vegetables simmered in a spiced onion-tomato sauce.

name: Creamy Alfredo Pasta
description: Fettuccine tossed in a velvety garlic‑cream sauce with parmesan.

name: Arrabbiata Penne
description: Penne in a spicy tomato‑chili sauce, garnished with fresh basil.

name: Classic Hakka Noodles
description: Stir‑fried egg noodles with veggies and a hint of soy and garlic.

name: Schezwan Veg Noodles
description: Spicy Indo‑Chinese noodles with bell peppers, cabbage & Schezwan sauce.
